snippet.title: Making an SCP Horror game for mobile (SCP-582) | Devlog 0 Level Design
snippet.description:
Hey and thanks for watching the first Devlog of SCP-582!
showcasing the first level of the game. 
SCP-582 is a First-person horror game for mobile, about the SCP Foundation, and the item SCP-582.

SCP stands for Security, Containment, and Protection. The site is filled with hundreds of crowd-sourced entries about strange things and entities that violate natural law.

The SCP Foundation is the organization tasked with maintaining its containment.

After SCP was able to secure the dangerous ingredient SCP-582 (Slenderman), they gave doctor Jimmy the responsibility to begin the experiment. But they didn't know that SCP-582, during the experiment, would escape, destroy the base lab, and Jimmy would be able to survive, but not for long, he needed to escape from the SCP-582 lab.

For more information visit the game website: https://sileststudio.com/scp-582

To share your feedback: scp-582.feedbacks@sileststudio.com

Play our horror games: https://sileststudio.net/ourgames

Play the game : 

🌐Game Site: https://sileststudio.com/scp-582
✅ Google Play:  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sileststudio.SlendermanSCP582
✅ Galaxy Store: https://galaxy.store/SCP582

Follow us : 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/studiosilest
Twitter:https://twitter.com/StudioSilest
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sileststudio/

If you are interested in seeing more smaller updates you can follow me on Reddit! -
https://www.reddit.com/user/silestStudios

Join our discord server, to share your feedback and get help on your development journey: https://discord.gg/CPSmrdakKA

email: contact@sileststudio.com

#scp #scpfoundation #androidgames #sileststudio #horrorgamesandroid  #scp096 #scp582 #slenderman #slender 

SUBSCRIBE to the Channel and stay tuned for more games :)
